summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 9%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 713 m), feels like temperature (up 1.7°C), and inside temperature (up 1.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 787.6m higher than yesterday, 121.9m lower than the past week, 712.5m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 765m to a maximum of 2220m, averaging 2050m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2180m and 2770m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, the air will feel wet and humid. Showers, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. Weather could become unsettled.
